headline: How GE Vernova’s Leadership Shift And AI Power Demand Themes At GE Vernova (GEV) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Earlier in January 2026, GE Vernova announced that Mavi Zingoni resigned as CEO of its Power segment, with Eric Gray stepping into the role while continuing as President and CEO of Gas Power, as investors also focused on the company’s upcoming fourth-quarter results and AI-related electricity demand themes. These leadership changes come as GE Vernova is highlighted as a key beneficiary of potential PJM backstop auctions and AI-driven power demand, supported by plans for a very large backlog,...
